Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、また間違って 毒キノコを拾ったりするなよ……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, don't accidentally pick any poisonous mushrooms again...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何？ 毒キノコって何の事？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? What's this about poisonous mushrooms?

Entry.JapaneseText: わあぁぁぁ、<Hilda>には言うな！ またイヤミのネタにされちまうだろ！
Entry.EnglishText: Waaaah! Don't tell her! I'll become a laughingstock again!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……今度は<Tytree>に ちゃんと毒見してもらうからネ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...This time, let's make sure to have <Tytree> test it for poison.
